name: Opportunity
text: The Innovation Center creates opportunities for students and graduates to develop and market their business and technology ideas for the real world.

name: Creative Content
text: The ideas curated by the Innovation Center will always belong to the students. For more information on this download the documents below.

name: Team Up
text: The Innovation Center brings together teams to bring student ideas to life. It also assists in bringing in industry experts to help enhance the development of the project. Students may also come from outside of Neumont College of Computer Science if Neumont does not have students with the necessary background, allowing students to work on diverse teams.

name: Market It
text: The Innovation Center helps students create business models around their ideas, and provides students with opportunities to become involved in statewide business competitions.
